Usage
=====

System Requirement
------------------

- Operating system: Linux or MacOS
- MATLAB (Simulink/Stateflow): >= R2020a (MATLAB license needed)

Installation
------------

.. code-block:: bash

   git clone https://github.com/choshina/CauMon.git
   git submodule init
   git submodule update
   make

Usage
-----

1. Start MATLAB GUI.
2. Run ``configure.m``.
3. Run examples in ``experiment/``, such as:

.. code-block:: matlab

   Figure2a
